Class OfficerService

java.lang.Object
Service.ApplicantService
Service.OfficerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantService, IOfficerService
public class OfficerService extends ApplicantService implements IOfficerService
Service class providing functionalities for HDB officers, including project registrations, application handling, enquiry responses, and project filtering.
